DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study evaluate safety efficacy propranolol eye drop preterm newborn precocious stage retinopathy prematurity ( ROP ) . Preterm newborn ( gestational age 23-32 week ) stage 2 ROP ( zone II without plus ) receive propranolol eye drop treatment retinal vascularization complete . Propranolol concentration measure dried blood spot first 3 day treatment steady state . Cardiovascular respiratory parameter continuously monitor . Blood sampling check metabolic , renal liver function perform periodically , well cardiac function , order verify treatment safety . Serial ophthalmological evaluation plan monitor efficacy treatment , ROP progression possible complication .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Propranolol Eye Drops Treating Retinopathy Premature
DOC.criteria: Preterm newborn ( gestational age 2332 week ) stage 2 ROP , zone II without plus . A signed parental inform consent . Newborns heart failure ; Newborns congenital cardiovascular anomaly , except persistent ductus arteriosus , patent foramen ovale small ventricular septal defect ; Newborns recurrent bradycardia ( heart rate < 90 beat per minute ) ; Newborns second third degree atrioventricular block ; Newborns hypotension ; Newborns renal failure ; Newborns actual cerebral haemorrhage ; Newborns diseases contraindicate use betaadrenoreceptor blocker .
